original_text:
There is none to guide her
    among all the sons she has borne;
there is none to take her by the hand
    among all the sons she has brought up.
korean_text: 네가 낳은 모든 아들 중에 너를 인도할 자가 없고 네가 양육한 모든 아들 중에 그 손으로 너를 이끌 자도 없도다

sentences.original_text: There is none to guide her
among all the sons she has borne
there is none to take her by the hand
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀의 손을 잡아줄 자가 아무도 없다

sentences.original_text: among all the sons she has brought up
